title: Could the Spice Girls really sing? - Quora

response.answer_text: They could all sing technically for sure. Victoria went to a performing arts school before joining the group and so did Mel B & C along with Emma, Geri had no standard performing arts training but she can sing. There are various levels of singing and none of them were exactly Mariah Carey standard or extremely strong singers but they could harmonise and sounded really good together and each girl has a distinct voice that works well in different places. E.g. Emma and Mel C would tend to sing the high notes, Geri and Mel B would sing in the lower range and Victoria was fairly middle but usually joining the lower range.

Their voices certainly did blend well together and they sure did know how to write catchy, infectious pop songs. But to answer the question of “can the spice girls really sing” I would say the answer is basically mixed: some members of the group had superb voices, and others not so much. Victoria, Mel C, Geri and Emma had very strong voices. Mel B did not.
Spice Girls – Sporty, Ginger, Posh, Baby, and Scary. For the most part, yes! Each spice girl has a unique sound. Put together and it just worked and their fashion style worked, too.
